Name: A Quiet Mind
About the game: Welcome to A Quiet Mind! You find yourself in a new place and have to get home! Your goal is to open up portals to continue your exploration in this new world. If you open up enough portals, maybe you can get out. Relax as you contemplate this low pressure puzzle, and think hard because the answer might be right in front of you. Gameplay: - Explore calming 3D environments - Solve puzzles to calm your mind - Defeat enemies - Interact with objects Controls: Xbox360 Controller: Look/Run - joysticks Interact - X Run - L3 Keyboard: Look - A,S,D,W Move - Arrow Keys Enter - Interact Shift - Run Space - Pause
Meta Title: A Quiet Mind: Jun 4, 2018, Eitan Prince and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on A Quiet Mind? Check out the release date (Jun 4, 2018), developer insights from Eitan Prince, and a complete game summary.
